FISHER: In my opinion...we did too little, too lateâ€”but we also
learned very much in Chinal We had an idea in China
and we put it to work on the good old-fashioned
better-late-than-never principle and it wasnft wasted
because it was a Good Ideal The Idea was the J.C.R.R. -
the Joint Commission on Rural Reconstruction.
